description:
The MPG Sueded Relaxed Pant is a comfortable and stylish option for casual wear. It features a sueded finish that gives it a soft and smooth texture, a relaxed fit that allows for easy movement, and a drawcord waistband that ensures a secure and adjustable fit.

  • The pant is made with 50% TENCEL™ Modal fabric which is responsibly sourced from beech trees
  • They are also made with recycled polyester and spandex, which are durable and stretchy fabrics that can withstand wear and tear
  • The pant also has side pockets for storing essentials and a Smartphone pocket inside 1 side pocket
  • Whether you are lounging at home, running errands, or meeting friends, the MPG Sueded Relaxed Pant is a versatile and cozy choice for any occasion
name: MPG Sueded Relaxed Pant - Women's
